name: Personal-work
tagline: All the work I have done so that recruiters can see it
body:
Welcome to my GitHub Page.
***

 This page gives a overview of the web design projects as well as the business intelligence projects that I have done as a part of my academic requirements and also few that i have done in my spare time

The following is the list of my software development projects with their description

***

## Web Development Projects:

### 1. [Indians In Boston](https://github.com/dhaval91/Personal-Work/tree/master/Dhaval_Doshi_WebDesign_Final)

   • Developed a completely responsive website for restaurant reviews using Google Maps API

   • Used various JQUERY plugins, HTML5, CSS3, PHP, AJAX to develop the website 
 
### 2. [Online Shopping](https://github.com/dhaval91/Personal-Work/tree/master/OnlineShoppingSupplyChain)

   • Designed an online shopping portal for the customers and sellers

   • Developed using Spring MVC, Hibernate as the framework along with HTML5, CSS3, JSP, JavaScript

### 3. [Drug Counterfeiting](https://github.com/dhaval91/Personal-Work/tree/master/Doshi_Dhaval_DrugCounterfeitProject)

   • Designed a system to track drugs throughout its supply chain in order to prevent counterfeiting drugs

   • Developed a Java application using SwingX framework and Db40 for Object persistence

***

## Business Intelligence / ETL projects:

### 1. [Company Profiling BI System ](https://github.com/dhaval91/Personal-Work/tree/master/Company%20Profiling%20BI)

   • Developed a BI system to predict the probability of securing a job at a given company based on their resume

   • Collected data related to candidate skills using a survey and developed the system using Pentaho and Tableau

### 2. Disease Management Analytics                                                                                                         

   • Developed a system to identify the causes of malaria and to predict its occurrence based on the causes

   • Built the solution using Cassandra, Pentaho and Tableau

### 3. Contoso DataSet

   • Created a complete BI solution for the contoso retail dataset in SQL Server and MySQL

   • Used and compared the ETL process in Pentaho, SSIS and Talend

   • Compared QlikView, Tableau and PowerPivot with respect to visualization and reporting

###   Health+ 
 
   • Designed an app to monitor day to day activities including the eating habits for specific illness

   • Involved in the planning process along with the requirements gathering and developed an iOS prototype
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
